title: WHen can we expect Illaoi W and E bug fixes?
body:
Her W and E have soo many bugs with them.

When can we expect to see work on them?

replies.body: Yes, there are so many times where w just gets canceled for no reason or when tentacles dont attack spirits even though they are in range.

Also her E is blocked by all kinds of things that shouldnt.

Ekkos Q
Swains Q
Frost Queens Claim Ghosts
Quinns Q

(basicly most Q attacks that throw something that you cant interact with.
